mapper.select: SELECT P.*, F.address_sido, F.address_sigungu, F.address_street, F.address_details, F.farm_name FROM marifarm.carbon_products P JOIN marifarm.projects PJ ON P.project_id = PJ.project_id JOIN marifarm.farms F ON PJ.farm_id = F.farm_id WHERE P.cp_id = #{cpId}
SELECT ucl_id FROM marifarm.user_certificate_links WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT discount_rate_pct FROM marifarm.reduction_sale_policy WHERE #{sharePercent} >= min_ratio_pct AND #{sharePercent} < max_ratio_pct

SELECT cp_id AS cpId, project_id AS projectId, cp_type AS category, cp_price AS cpPrice, cp_amount AS cpAmount, product_certificate AS productCertificate, vintage_year AS vintageYear, cp_detail AS cpDetail, cp_title FROM carbon_products ORDER BY cp_id DESC
